reviews.text: 21st July 2010Clear gold beer. Little white head. Light semi crisp palate. Lagerish malt with a subtle but odd smoky note. A little light orange  and peach hops before the malt turns creamy. Crisp snappy minerally finish. Itâs all right, refreshing and and crisp. Good session beer on a hot day.

500ml bottle bought at newcastle xmas market. pours very dark brown with thin head. aroma is of coffee and is hoppy. nice taste but extremely watery i thought. would have expected a bit more but then again, itâs only 3.9%!
Cask conditioned at The Wellington, Birmingham. Amber to brown with no head. Pretty flat in character, sweet fruitiness, hints of caramel. Rather disappointing unfortunately.
